To migrate the `persistence.xml` file to Jakarta EE, we need to update the namespace and schema location to point to the Jakarta EE namespace. The current namespace is `http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/persistence`, which is the Java Community Process (JCP) namespace. We need to replace this with the Jakarta EE namespace, `https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/persistence`.

Additionally, we need to update the schema version number to match the Jakarta EE version. Since we are migrating to Jakarta EE 9+, we will use the `persistence_3_0.xsd` schema.

We will update the `xmlns` attribute in the `persistence` element, as well as the `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute, to point to the new namespace and schema location.
